description.english: Awarded for unlocking all other achievements.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir obtenu tous les succès.
description.italian: Conferito per aver sbloccato tutti gli altri achievement.
description.spanish: Por haber desbloqueado todos los demás logros.
description.japanese: すべての実績を獲得した
description.latam: Se concede al desbloquear todos los demás logros.

description.english: Awarded for leaving Aliahan.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir quitté Aliahan.
description.italian: Conferito per aver lasciato Aliahan.
description.spanish: Por haber salido de Aliana.
description.japanese: フィールドに出た
description.latam: Se concede al salir de Aliahan.

displayName.german: Die Welt liegt dir zu Füßen

description.english: Awarded for leaving the Shrine of Promise.
description.german: Lasse den Schrein der Verheißung hinter dir.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir quitté le sanctuaire de la promesse.
description.italian: Conferito per aver lasciato il Tempio della promessa.
description.spanish: Por haber emprendido la aventura desde la Capilla de la Promesa.
description.schinese: 从指引祠堂踏上了旅途
description.tchinese: 從誘導祠堂啟程踏上旅途了
description.japanese: いざないのほこらから旅立った
description.latam: Se concede al salir de la Capilla de la Promesa.

displayName.japanese: ゆるしてくれよ！ な！ な！

description.english: Awarded for defeating Robbin' 'Ood.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir vaincu le Chaperon vert.
description.italian: Conferito per aver sconfitto Ruban Hood.
description.spanish: Por haber derrotado a Luis Candelas.
description.japanese: カンダタを倒した
description.latam: Se concede al derrotar a Robbin Hood.

description.english: Awarded for defeating the Ripper of the Rift.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir vaincu le démon du Nil.
description.italian: Conferito per aver sconfitto lo Scorticatore massimo.
description.spanish: Por haber derrotado a Hapi.
description.japanese: ナイルのあくまを倒した
description.latam: Se concede al derrotar al destripador de la grieta.

description.english: Awarded for defeating Robbin' 'Ood...again.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir vaincu le Chaperon vert... encore.
description.italian: Conferito per aver sconfitto Ruban Hood... di nuovo.
description.spanish: Por haber derrotado a Luis Candelas... otra vez.
description.japanese: もう一度カンダタを倒した
description.latam: Se concede al derrotar a Robbin Hood otra vez.

displayName.japanese: そなたに　船を　あたえよう！

description.english: Awarded for obtaining your very own ship.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir obtenu son propre navire.
description.italian: Conferito per aver ottenuto una nave tua.
description.spanish: Por haber conseguido tu propio barco.
description.japanese: 船を手に入れた
description.latam: Se concede al conseguir tu propio barco.

description.english: Awarded for defeating Orochi.

description.italian: Conferito per aver sconfitto Orochi.
description.spanish: Por haber derrotado a Orochi.
description.japanese: やまたのおろちを倒した
description.latam: Se concede al derrotar a Orochi.

displayName.spanish: Batalla en el ombligo del mundo

description.french: Décerné pour avoir vaincu le mage vert.

description.japanese: ウォーロックを倒した

description.english: Awarded for defeating the dying fires.

description.spanish: Por haber derrotado las necroflamas.
description.japanese: よみのばんにんを倒した

description.english: Awarded for defeating the boss troll that had disguised itself as Manoza's ruler.

description.french: Décerné pour avoir vaincu le chef troll.

description.english: Awarded for defeating the Garboyle.

description.french: Décerné pour avoir ressuscité Ramia.

description.spanish: Por haber logrado la reaparición de Ramia.

description.english: Awarded for defeating Baramos.

description.japanese: バラモスを倒した
description.latam: Se concede al derrotar a Baramos.

description.japanese: アレフガルドに到達した

description.english: Awarded for freeing Rubiss.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir libéré Rubiss.

description.english: Awarded for summoning forth the bridge of the rain's bow.

description.italian: Conferito per aver evocato il ponte dell'arco della pioggia.

displayName.tchinese: 然後全新的傳說由此開始……！
displayName.japanese: そして　伝説が　はじまった……！

description.english: Awarded for completing the game's story.
description.german: Spiele die Hauptgeschichte bis zum Ende.

description.spanish: Por haber completado la historia.
description.japanese: エンディングを見た

description.english: Awarded for filling up the Defeated Monster List.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir vaincu tous les types de montres.
description.italian: Conferito per aver riempito l'elenco dei mostri sconfitti.

description.japanese: 討伐モンスターリストを全て埋めた

description.english: Awarded for obtaining 250 items.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir obtenu 250 objets.

description.spanish: Por haber conseguido 250 objetos.
description.japanese: アイテムを250種見つけた

description.english: Awarded for learning all spells and abilities.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir appris tous les sorts et aptitudes.
description.italian: Conferito per aver imparato tutti gli incantesimi e le abilità.
description.spanish: Por haber aprendido todos los conjuros y habilidades.
description.schinese: 学会了全部的咒文和特技

description.japanese: すべての呪文・特技を習得した

displayName.japanese: さあ　受け取るがよい

description.english: Awarded for obtaining the grand medal.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir obtenu la médaille du dragon.
description.italian: Conferito per aver ottenuto la grande medaglia.
description.spanish: Por haber obtenido la medalla eximia.
description.japanese: 金のメダルを手に入れた

description.english: Awarded for having Xenlon grant every one of your wishes.
description.german: Lass dir von Xenlon alle Wünsche erfüllen.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir eu tous ses vœux exaucés par Xenlon.
description.italian: Conferito perché Xenlon ha esaudito tutti i tuoi desideri.
description.spanish: Por haber logrado que Xenlon te conceda todos los deseos.
description.tchinese: 讓神龍實現了所有願望
description.japanese: しんりゅうの願い事をすべてかなえた
description.latam: Se concede al lograr que Xenlon haga realidad todos tus deseos.

description.english: Awarded for rescuing all friendly monsters.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir recueilli tous les monstres amicaux.
description.italian: Conferito per aver salvato tutti i mostri amichevoli.
description.spanish: Por haber acogido todos los monstruos dóciles.
description.schinese: 收服了所有魔性消散的怪物
description.tchinese: 收容了所有失去魔性的怪物
description.japanese: 魔性の消えたモンスターをすべて保護した

description.english: Awarded for getting all Morgan Minimann's prizes.
description.german: Erhalte alle Preise von Münzbert Güldenglanz.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir obtenu toutes les récompenses de monsieur Médaille.
description.italian: Conferito per aver ottenuto tutti i premi di Morgan Minimann.
description.spanish: Por haber conseguido todas las recompensas de Mederico.
description.schinese: 拿到了徽章叔叔的全部礼品
description.tchinese: 獲得了徽章伯伯的所有獎品
description.japanese: メダルおじさんから景品をすべて貰った
description.latam: Se concede al conseguir todos los premios de Morgan Minimán.

displayName.japanese: バトルロードチャンピオン

description.english: Awarded for winning the rank-11 monster arena tournament.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir gagné le rang 11 de l'arène des monstres.

description.japanese: バトルロードSSSランクを制覇した

description.english: Awarded for winning 1000 battles.

description.italian: Conferito per aver vinto 1000 battaglie.
description.spanish: Por haber ganado en 1000 batallas.

description.tchinese: 戰鬥勝利次數達到了1000次
description.japanese: 戦闘勝利回数が1000回になった

description.english: Awarded for interacting with 100 sparkly spots on the world map.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir interagi avec 100 points lumineux dans le monde.
description.italian: Conferito per aver interagito con 100 puntini luccicanti nella mappa del mondo.
description.spanish: Por haber interactuado con 100 puntos brillantes en el mundo exterior.
description.schinese: 回收了100个野外闪光处的物品
description.tchinese: 回收了100個原野上的發亮點
description.japanese: フィールドのキラキラを100個回収した

displayName.italian: I soldi non fanno la felicità

description.english: Awarded for earning 100,000 gold coins over the course of your adventure.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir gagné 100 000 pièces d'or au cours de l'aventure.
description.italian: Conferito per aver ottenuto 100.000 monete d'oro nel corso dell'avventura.
description.spanish: Por haber acumulado 100 000 monedas de oro durante la aventura.
description.schinese: 收集到的金币总额超过了100,000金币
description.japanese: 集めたゴールドの累計が100,000ゴールドを超えた
description.latam: Se concede al ganar 100 000 monedas de oro a lo largo de la aventura.

description.english: Awarded for opening 100 treasure chests.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir ouvert 100 coffres au trésor.
description.italian: Conferito per aver aperto 100 forzieri.
description.spanish: Por haber abierto 100 cofres del tesoro.
description.japanese: 宝箱を100個あけた
description.latam: Se concede al abrir 100 cofres del tesoro.

description.english: Awarded for defeating a metal slime or liquid metal slime for the first time.
description.german: Bezwinge einen Metallschleim oder einen Flüssigmetallschleim.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir vaincu un gluant de métal ou un gluant de mercure pour la première fois.
description.italian: Conferito per aver sconfitto uno Slime grigio o un liquislime per la prima volta.
description.koreana: 처음으로 메탈 슬라임 또는 외톨이 메탈을 쓰러뜨렸다
description.spanish: Por haber derrotado un limo metálico o un burbujilimo metálico por primera vez.
description.schinese: 首次打倒了金属史莱姆或流浪金属史莱姆
description.tchinese: 首次打倒了金屬史萊姆或流浪金屬史萊姆
description.japanese: 初めてメタルスライムかはぐれメタルを倒した
description.latam: Se concede al derrotar por primera vez a un limo metálico o a un burbujilimo metálico.

description.english: Awarded for changing vocations for the first time.

description.spanish: Por haber cambiado de vocación por primera vez.
description.japanese: 初めて転職した

description.english: Awarded for removing the curse placed on Norvik.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir retiré la malédiction du village de Norvik.

description.japanese: ノアニールの呪いを解いた

description.english: Awarded for obtaining the auroral helm.

description.italian: Conferito per aver ottenuto l'elmo scintillante.
description.spanish: Por haber conseguido el yelmo boreal.
description.japanese: ひかりのかぶとを手に入れた

description.english: Awarded for being ripped off.

description.english: Awarded for enjoying a puff-puff.
description.german: Genieß eine Runde Oh La La.

description.italian: Conferito per aver praticato il puff-puff.

description.latam: Se concede por disfrutar de un puf puf.

description.english: Awarded for obtaining the sage vocation.

description.spanish: Por haberte aventurado en la vocación de sabio.
description.japanese: けんじゃに転職した
description.latam: Se concede al conseguir la vocación de sabio.

description.english: Awarded for adding someone to your party for the first time.
description.german: Finde neue Gefährten für deine Gruppe.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir intégré quelqu'un dans l'équipe pour la première fois.
description.italian: Conferito per aver aggiunto qualcuno al tuo gruppo per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Por haber añadido a alguien al grupo por primera vez.
description.schinese: 首次在队伍中增加了伙伴
description.tchinese: 首次讓夥伴加入了隊伍
description.japanese: 初めてパーティに仲間を加えた

displayName.japanese: がんばって　この国を　おさめてくれよ

description.english: Awarded for acquiescing to the king's request to become ruler of Romaria.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir accédé au trône de Romalie selon la volonté de son roi.
description.italian: Conferito per aver accettato la richiesta del Re di diventare regnante di Romaria.
description.spanish: Por haber accedido a la petición del rey de Romaria de convertirte en monarca.
description.schinese: 接受了罗马利亚国王禅让的王位
description.tchinese: 接下了羅馬利亞王禪讓的王位
description.japanese: ロマリア王から王位を譲られた
description.latam: Se concede al aceptar la petición del rey de convertirte en gobernante de Romaria.

displayName.japanese: しんでしまうとは　なさけない！

description.english: Awarded for reviving yourself at a church for the first time.
description.german: Belebe dich in einer Kirche wieder.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir ressuscité à l'église pour la première fois.
description.italian: Conferito per essere tornato in vita presso una chiesa per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Por haber vuelto a la vida en una iglesia por primera vez.
description.japanese: 初めて教会で復活した
description.latam: Se concede al revivir en una iglesia por primera vez.

displayName.spanish: Quien lo encuentra, se lo queda
displayName.latam: Si lo veo, me lo quedo

description.english: Awarded for obtaining the golden claws and escaping the great pyramid's basement.
description.german: Finde die Goldenen Klauen in der Pyramide und entkomme aus den Katakomben.
description.french: Décerné pour avoir obtenu les griffes dorées dans les sous-sols de la pyramide.
description.italian: Conferito per aver ottenuto gli artigli dorati ed essere fuggito dal seminterrato della Piramide.
description.spanish: Por haber logrado obtener las garras doradas y escapar del sótano de la gran pirámide.
description.schinese: 从金字塔的地下带出了黄金爪
description.tchinese: 從金字塔地底帶出了黃金爪
description.japanese: おうごんのつめをピラミッドの地下から持ち出した
description.latam: Se concede al conseguir las garras doradas y escapar del sótano de la gran pirámide.
